title: Game-Based Science Learning Program to Enhance Engagement for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customized design for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to improve application of scientific principles. Flexible learning progression according to individual work schedules

learning_goals: Learners achieve participation rates of over 80% through game-based activities
Learners present and analyze at least three real-world applications of scientific concepts
Learners demonstrate collaborative learning strategies with an 85%+ achievement rate in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
